name: pump_auto_control_mode
description: Normally-off: pump is OFF unless some automation logic condition wants it to be ON (e.g. fire extinguishing system)\r\n Normally-on: pump is ON unless some automation logic condition wants it to be OFF (e.g. if the well is empty)

name: pump_auto_control_turn_off_when_well_empty
name_en: Turn off the pump when the well is empty

name: pump_auto_control_turn_off_when_tank_full
name_en: Turn off the pump when the tank is full
